titles.title: Great Lakes Mercury Reduction Act
To prohibit the issuance of new source permits under the Clean Air Act for certain sources that would result in the deposition of mercury into the Great Lakes System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 7/26/2002--Introduced. Great Lakes Mercury Reduction Act - Prohibits issuance or approval under the Clean Air Act of any permit for a new source that is located in any State bordering any of the Great Lakes and whose emissions would result in the deposition of mercury into the Great Lakes System.
